betterquesting:10.desc:8:
These blocks when added to your alveary will induce some sort of effect.

The Alveary Frame Housing allows you to add 5 of the frames to each of these blocks.

The Alveary Swarmer will, when fed royal jelly, spawn swarmer hives around it which will spawn ignoble princesses of the same genes and breed as the queen in the alveary.

The Alveary Stabiliser will prevent bees from mutating into a new species.

The Electrical Stimulator is used to give different effects when given different electron tubes in a circuit when powered at the cost of genetic decay. Note that the production effect caps at 1000% apparently.

The Alveary Transmission will give power to all blocks in an alveary that need it meaning you only need 1 power input.

The Mutator will increase the chance of mutation when fed items soul sand, ender pearls, or eyes of ender. Note that having multiple mutators will not stack their effects.
